snippet: Newcastle United maintained their slim advantage at the top of the English Championship after first-half goals from Dwight Gayle and Mo Diame earned them a 2-1 victory in their first-ever meeting with Burton Albion on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Newcastle United maintained their slim advantage at the top of the English Championship after first-half goals from Dwight Gayle and Mo Diame earned them a 2-1 victory in their first-ever meeting with Burton Albion on Saturday.

headline.main: Newcastle Stay Top as Brighton Ruin Zola's Return
headline.print_headline: Newcastle Stay Top as Brighton Ruin Zola's Return
